heading: My path hasn't been
name: Juniper
paragraph1:
Sales Veteran. AI-Augmented Developer.
My name is Juniper.
I combine 5+ years of business experience with cutting-edge AI workflows. I don’t just write code; I leverage AI to build faster, smarter, and more efficient digital solutions that focus on your business goals.


資深業務．AI 賦能工程師。
我結合五年以上的商業實戰經驗與最新的 AI 開發流程。我不只寫程式，我善用 AI 提升效率，為你打造更快速、更聰明，且專注於解決商業目標的數位解方。
paragraph2:
You don't need a traditional coder; you need a modern solver.
I bridge the gap between human needs and AI technology. By utilizing AI-assisted coding, I cut down development time and focus on what truly matters: perfecting your user experience and driving sales.


你不缺傳統工程師，你缺的是懂 AI 的現代解方。
我連結人性需求與 AI 科技。透過 AI 輔助開發，我能大幅縮短技術工時，把時間與資源花在真正重要的事情上——優化你的使用者體驗，並帶動業績成長。
whyMattersTitle: Why does this matter to you?
whyMattersContent: Because I don't look at a website as just a collection of <div> tags. I see it as a digital storefront that needs to convert, function, and serve real humans. I combine technical precision with empathy to build tools that actually work for your business.
